sentences.sentence: Desiring to have his reasons for liking him, I could only gather the sentences — 'I known't: he pays dad back what he gies to me — he curses daddy for cursing me.
sentences.translation: 我想知道他喜欢他的理由，只听到这些话：“我不知道——爸爸怎么对付我，他就怎么对付爸爸——他骂爸爸因为爸爸骂我。”

sentences.sentence: It gies physicians and patients more options, which is a good thing.
sentences.translation: 这给内科专家和病人更多的选择，哪一种更好一些。

sentences.sentence: Astronomy education research (AER) has begun to show that carefully adapted versions of those research-validated learning strate gies can achieve large gains in the Astro 101 classroom.
sentences.translation: 天文学教育研究（AER）也逐渐证明了这一点：在那些具有研究效度的学习策略中，认真选取合适的策略，可以使天文学101的课堂教学收获倍增。
